features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.short: While unarmored and without a shield, AC = 10 + Dex mod + Wis mod.
desc: Beginning at 1st level, while you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

features.name: Martial Arts
features.short: Dex for attacks/damage; MA die scales; bonus-action unarmed after Attack.
desc: Your practice of martial arts gives you mastery of combat styles that use unarmed strikes and monk weapons (shortswords and any simple melee weapons that don't have the two-handed or heavy property).
You gain the following benefits while you are unarmed or wielding only monk weapons and you aren't wearing armor or wielding a shield.
bullets: You can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes and monk weapons.
You can roll a d4 in place of the normal damage of your unarmed strike or monk weapon. This die changes as you gain monk levels, as shown in the Martial Arts column of the Monk table.
When you use the Attack action with an unarmed strike or a monk weapon on your turn, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action.
features.notes: Some monasteries use specialized forms (e.g., nunchaku, kama).

features.name: Ki
features.short: Ki points = level; fuel features; short/long rest to recover (meditate 30m).
desc: Starting at 2nd level, your training allows you to harness the mystic energy of ki. Your monk level determines the number of ki points you have.
You can spend these points to fuel various ki features. You start knowing Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind; you learn more as you level.
When you spend a ki point, it is unavailable until you finish a short or long rest, during which you meditate at least 30 minutes.
Some ki features require a saving throw: Ki save DC = 8 + your Wisdom modifier + your proficiency bonus.

features.name: Flurry of Blows
features.short: BA: spend 1 ki → make two unarmed strikes after Attack.
desc: Immediately after you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes as a bonus action.

features.name: Patient Defense
features.short: BA: spend 1 ki → Dodge.
desc: You can spend 1 ki point to take the Dodge action as a bonus action on your turn.

features.name: Step of the Wind
features.short: BA: spend 1 ki → Dash or Disengage; jump distance doubled this turn.
desc: You can spend 1 ki point to take the Disengage or Dash action as a bonus action on your turn; your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

features.name: Dedicated Weapon
features.short: After a rest, imbue a weapon as a monk weapon (simple/martial, proficient, not heavy/special).
desc: Whenever you finish a short or long rest, you can touch one weapon and count it as a monk weapon until you use this feature again.
The weapon must be simple or martial, you must be proficient with it, and it must lack the heavy and special properties.

features.name: Unarmored Movement
features.short: +10 ft speed while unarmored/no shield; bonus increases with level; at 9th walk on walls/liquids.
desc: Starting at 2nd level, your speed increases by 10 feet while you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield. This bonus increases at higher levels as shown on the Monk table.
At 9th level, you can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids on your turn without falling during the move.

features.name: Deflect Missiles
features.short: Reaction reduce ranged damage by 1d10 + Dex mod + level; at 0 can catch; spend 1 ki to throw (20/60).
desc: When you are hit by a ranged weapon attack, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + your Dexterity modifier + your monk level.

If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the missile (if you have a free hand). You can spend 1 ki point to make a ranged attack (range 20/60 ft) with it as part of the same reaction. You are proficient and the missile counts as a monk weapon.

features.name: Bonus Proficiencies (Drunken Master)
features.short: Gain proficiency: Performance and brewer's supplies (if you lack them).
desc: When you choose this tradition, gain proficiency in the Performance skill and with brewer's supplies if you don't already have them.

features.name: Drunken Technique
features.short: When you use Flurry of Blows → gain Disengage and +10 ft speed until end of turn.
desc: Whenever you use Flurry of Blows, you gain the benefit of the Disengage action, and your walking speed increases by 10 feet until the end of the current turn.

features.name: Ki-Fueled Attack
features.short: If you spent ≥1 ki as part of your action, you may make 1 attack as a BA this turn.
desc: If you spend 1 ki point or more as part of your action on your turn, you can make one attack with an unarmed strike or a monk weapon as a bonus action before the end of the turn.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.short: +2 to one ability or +1/+1; or a feat (if allowed).
desc: Increase one ability by 2, or two abilities by 1 (max 20). If feats are allowed, you may take a feat instead.

features.name: Slow Fall
features.short: Reaction: reduce falling damage by 5 × monk level.
desc: Beginning at 4th level, when you fall you can use your reaction to reduce any falling damage you take by an amount equal to five times your monk level.

features.name: Quickened Healing
features.short: Action: spend 2 ki and roll MA die → heal roll + proficiency bonus.
desc: As an action, spend 2 ki points and roll your Martial Arts die. Regain hit points equal to the roll + your proficiency bonus.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.short: Attack twice when you take the Attack action.
desc: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

features.name: Stunning Strike
features.short: On hit with melee weapon, spend 1 ki → target Con save or stunned until end of your next turn.
desc: When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can spend 1 ki point to attempt a stunning strike (Constitution save or stunned until the end of your next turn).

features.name: Focused Aim
features.short: When you miss, spend 1–3 ki to add +2 per ki to the roll.
desc: When you miss with an attack roll, you can spend 1 to 3 ki points to increase your attack roll by +2 for each ki point spent.

features.name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
features.short: Unarmed strikes count as magical for overcoming resistance/immunity.
desc: Your unarmed strikes count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

features.name: Tipsy Sway
features.short: Leap to Your Feet (stand from prone for 5 ft); Redirect Attack (reaction, spend 1 ki).
desc: Starting at 6th level, you can move in sudden, swaying ways. You gain the following benefits.
bullets: Leap to Your Feet: When you're prone, you can stand by spending 5 feet of movement instead of half your speed.

Redirect Attack: When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can spend 1 ki point as a reaction to cause that attack to hit another creature of your choice (not the attacker) within 5 feet of you that you can see.

features.name: Evasion
features.short: Dex save for half → take none on success, half on fail (instead of full).
desc: When subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw for half damage, you take no damage on a success and only half on a failure.

features.name: Stillness of Mind
features.short: Action: end one effect on you causing charmed or frightened.
desc: You can use your action to end one effect on yourself that is causing you to be charmed or frightened.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.short: +2 to one ability or +1/+1; or a feat (if allowed).
desc: Increase one ability by 2, or two abilities by 1 (max 20). If feats are allowed, you may take a feat instead.

features.name: Unarmored Movement (Improvement)
features.short: While moving on your turn, you can run on vertical surfaces and across liquids (no falling during the move).
desc: At 9th level, you gain the ability to move along vertical surfaces and across liquids on your turn without falling during the move.

features.name: Purity of Body
features.short: Immune to disease and poison.
desc: Your mastery of ki makes you immune to disease and poison.

features.name: Drunkard's Luck
features.short: When you have disadvantage on an ability check/attack/save, spend 2 ki to cancel the disadvantage.
desc: When you make an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw with disadvantage, you can spend 2 ki points to cancel the disadvantage for that roll.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.short: +2 to one ability or +1/+1; or a feat (if allowed).
desc: Increase one ability by 2, or two abilities by 1 (max 20). If feats are allowed, you may take a feat instead.

features.name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
features.short: Understand all spoken languages; any creature that understands a language understands you.
desc: You learn to touch the ki of other minds so you understand all spoken languages, and any creature that can understand a language can understand what you say.

features.name: Diamond Soul
features.short: Proficiency in all saving throws; on a failed save spend 1 ki to reroll (keep second result).
desc: Your mastery of ki grants proficiency in all saving throws.
Additionally, when you fail a saving throw, you can spend 1 ki point to reroll it and take the second result.

features.name: Timeless Body
features.short: Don't suffer frailty of old age; can't be aged magically; no need for food or water.
desc: You suffer none of the frailty of old age and can't be aged magically. You can still die of old age. You no longer need food or water.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.short: +2 to one ability or +1/+1; or a feat (if allowed).
desc: Increase one ability by 2, or two abilities by 1 (max 20). If feats are allowed, you may take a feat instead.

features.name: Intoxicated Frenzy
features.short: When you Flurry of Blows, you can make up to 3 extra attacks (total 5), each at a different target.
desc: When you use your Flurry of Blows, you can make up to three additional attacks with it (up to a total of five), provided each targets a different creature this turn.

features.name: Empty Body
features.short: Action: spend 4 ki → invisible 1 min & resistance to all but force; spend 8 ki → Astral Projection (self only).
desc: Spend 4 ki points as an action to become invisible for 1 minute and gain resistance to all damage but force.
Additionally, you can spend 8 ki to cast Astral Projection without material components; you can't take others with you.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.short: +2 to one ability or +1/+1; or a feat (if allowed).
desc: Increase one ability by 2, or two abilities by 1 (max 20). If feats are allowed, you may take a feat instead.

features.name: Perfect Self
features.short: On initiative, if you have 0 ki, regain 4 ki.
desc: At 20th level, when you roll initiative and have no ki points remaining, you regain 4 ki points.
